SELECT A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.DAY_DIV ,A.WAY_DIV ,B.REP_ROUT_NM ,B.ROUT_TYPE ,(SELECT STTN_NM FROM BMS_STTN_MST WHERE STTN_ID = A.ST_STTN_ID AND DEL_YN!='Y') ST_STTN_NM ,(SELECT STTN_NM FROM BMS_STTN_MST WHERE STTN_ID = A.ED_STTN_ID AND DEL_YN!='Y') ED_STTN_NM ,C.ROUT_ID ,C.ROUT_NM FROM BRT_OPER_PL_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST B ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = B.REP_ROUT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST C ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = C.REP_ROUT_ID AND A.WAY_DIV = C.WAY_DIV AND C.DEL_YN != 'Y'
AND (C.ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || B.REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%'))
AND C.ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND B.REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
GROUP BY C.ROUT_ID, A.DAY_DIV ORDER BY A.REP_ROUT_ID, A.DAY_DIV, A.WAY_DIV, C.ROUT_ID

SELECT DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') OPER_DT ,A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.DAY_DIV ,A.WAY_DIV ,A.OPER_SN ,A.NODE_ID ,A.NODE_SN ,A.ALLOC_NO ,A.COR_ID ,A.NODE_TYPE ,A.ARRV_TM ,A.DPRT_TM ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPD_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') UPD_DTM ,B.REP_ROUT_NM ,B.WAY_ASC_NM ,B.WAY_DESC_NM ,C.ROUT_ID ,C.NODE_NM ,C.ACCRU_LEN FROM BRT_DAY_OPER_ALLOC_PL_NODE_INFO A INNER JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST B ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = B.REP_ROUT_ID INNER JOIN BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN C ON A.ROUT_ID = C.ROUT_ID AND A.NODE_ID = C.NODE_ID AND A.NODE_SN = C.NODE_SN AND (C.NODE_TYPE = 'NT001'||C.NODE_TYPE = 'NT002')
WHERE A.OPER_DT = #{OPER_DT} AND A.DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV} AND A.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID} AND (A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT001'||A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT002')
AND A.OPER_SN = #{OPER_SN}
ORDER BY OPER_SN, NODE_SN

SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM BRT_DAY_OPER_ALLOC_PL_NODE_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN BRT_MAIN_ROUT_NODE_INFO B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID AND A.NODE_ID = B.NODE_ID AND A.NODE_SN = B.NODE_SN AND (B.NODE_TYPE = 'NT001'||B.NODE_TYPE = 'NT002') WHERE A.OPER_DT = #{OPER_DT} AND A.DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV} AND A.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID} AND (A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT001'||A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT002') GROUP BY OPER_SN ORDER BY OPER_SN
